{"id":439928286,"lang":"python3","time":"6 months, 2 weeks","timestamp":1610047866,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"88 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/439928286/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"ZigZag Conversion","memory":"14.5 MB","code":"class Solution:\n    def convert(self, s: str, numRows: int) -> str:\n        if numRows is 1:\n            return s\n        \n        ans_array = []\n        \n        # create numRows empty strings for storing each row's answer\n        for i in range(numRows):\n            ans_array.append([])\n        \n        ptr = 0\n        curr_row = 0\n        flag = True  \n        # remembering if we are going down(true) or up(false) in rows\n        while(ptr < len(s)):\n            \n            ans_array[curr_row].append(s[ptr])\n            # print(ans_array)\n            \n            if flag:\n                if curr_row < (numRows - 1):\n                    curr_row += 1\n                else:\n                    flag = False\n                    curr_row -= 1\n            else:\n                if curr_row > 0:\n                    curr_row -= 1\n                else:\n                    flag = True\n                    curr_row += 1\n                \n            ptr += 1\n            \n        ans = ''\n        for a in ans_array:\n            ans += ''.join(a)\n        \n        return ans","compare_result":"","title_slug":"zigzag-conversion"}
